highlights:

Managed inventory and placed supply orders to maintain stock levels.
Upheld high cleanliness standards, keeping the store well-organized and inviting

Established strong customer connections, prioritizing guest satisfaction and service excellence.
Memorized and executed a variety of drink recipes quickly and accurately, maintaining a consistent quality of beverages.
Maintained store cleanliness and adhered to company standards for a welcoming environment.
